title: Ticket #1967: Per-slot prepare and exit hooks don't work
description:
I've run in to an issues with job hooks. It seems that per-slot prepare and exit hooks cannot be used in the 7.4.4 release.

The following does work: 

  STARTER_JOB_HOOK_KEYWORD = TEST1
  TEST1_HOOK_DIR = $(LOCAL_DIR)/bin
  TEST1_HOOK_PREPARE_JOB = $(TEST1_HOOK_DIR)/prepare_job

But changing this to: 

  SLOT1_JOB_HOOK_KEYWORD = TEST1
  TEST1_HOOK_DIR = $(LOCAL_DIR)/bin
  TEST1_HOOK_PREPARE_JOB = $(TEST1_HOOK_DIR)/prepare_job

Fails to run the prepare job script for just jobs landing on slot 1. It's a similar situation for the job exit hooks.
remarks:
2011-Mar-14 11:46:25 by ichesal:
The prepare_job hook I'm using to test this is: 

  #!/bin/sh
  echo '------' >> /tmp/prepare_job.out
  cat >> /tmp/prepare_job.out
  echo 'PreparedJob = True'
